name: Penne Pasta with Veggies
author: TMOWERY
summary: This is a hot pasta dish that is colorful and a great dish to pass at a dinner party.
ingredients: ½ pound asparagus, trimmed and cut into 1 inch pieces
2 cups sun-dried tomatoes, packed in oil
directions: Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C)
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain
In a large skillet over medium-high heat, roast asparagus, broccoli, bell pepper and zucchini until flecked with dark brown
In a large skillet over medium heat, melt butter
Saute garlic with prosciutto and sun-dried tomatoes until heated through
Toss with penne, roasted vegetables and Parmesan
Place in a 9x13 inch baking dish
Bake in preheated oven 30 to 40 minutes, until hot
